panels.visual: The party discovers the Staff of Silneas on a pedestal that radiates heat. The staff glows with dragon-fire power. Whortheus reaches for it eagerly, ink-stained fingers outstretched.
panels.dialogue: Whortheus: "The Staff of Silneas! It can control dragons themselves!"

panels.visual: Whortheus yanks his hand back, fingers burned. Armando tries next with similar results. The staff is impossibly hot to touch directly.
A horrible Nothic emerges from shadows - a twisted, one-eyed creature of madness. It grins with too many teeth as zombies begin rising from bone piles behind it.
panels.dialogue: Nothic: "The Wizard Council sends its regards..."

panels.visual: Eurostras uses mage hand to lift the staff, wielding it remotely. Dragon fire erupts from the staff, incinerating zombies and blasting open a sealed door. His expression shows surprise at his own power.
